While typically accustomed to cold water destinations, @nicvonrupp is no slouch in heaving Indonesian reefs. We spoke to Nic about his new film "The Reef Road", his newest of two films coming out this year, which you can read now on our site (link in bio). Here's Nic bouncing around at home in Portugal. Photo: @grantellis1. #SURFERphotos
The folks at @rvca have always been about celebrating unique individuals in surfing, skating, and the arts. For their 30 Days of Giveaways prize pack, they’re giving away Bruce Irons’ inspired batch of gear including trunks, tanks, shorts, and more. Enter today on our site!
“It’s always a struggle when your identity is representing a brand,” says Reynolds. “Because your identity may not fit perfectly with their vibe. But, then again, they picked you for your identity, so they should want you to be yourself. That’s the weird thing about being a professional surfer: your working life and your personal life are one and the same. You are a commercial, you know?” • An excerpt from @sealtooth from his profile feature "Mind Control" in our latest issue. Read his full interview on our site. Photo: @grantellis1 #SURFERphotos
Photo of the Day: @ramosjafet at Puerto Escondido this week. Shot by @moralesedwin. #SURFERphotos
Fun sized swells, warm water, and a longboard under the arm are what make a great summer. Your friends at @banksjournal want to give you their best recycled trunks so you can cruise your favorite logging spot with style and comfort. Enter todays 30 Days of Giveaways for your chance to win two pairs of trunks, steamer 2mm suit, and more from Banks. Head to our site to enter!
Lofty punts are almost a requirement when Dane Reynolds is around. Here's @brendongibbens in Portugal from our gallery from Dane's profile feature. Full gallery of @grantellis1 photos on our site. #SURFERphotos
"Surfing needs more patience. Share more waves and enjoy the moment. We’re all spinning way too fast."- True words by @andersenlisa from our "Wisdom" feature in our latest issue. For more of Lisa's wisdom, click the link in bio. Photo: Tom Dugan. #SURFERphotos
A dance of liquid and light. Photo: @raycollinsphoto. #SURFERphotos
Shaping boards for the best surfer in the world takes experience. In our latest edition of "In The Shaping Bay", Jon Pyzel of @pyzelsurfboards walks us through his Waialua headquarters and tells us about his journey, his relationship with @john_john_florence and the future of board construction. Live now on our site. #SURFERfilms
Celebrating a happy Friday with @mattdunsmore_. Photo: @andychiza. #SURFERphotos
